allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add SMS Payment Checker integration

Add SMS Payment Gateway system that receives bank SMS notifications
from an Android app and auto-matches payments using unique decimal amounts.

New files:
- SmsPaymentController \(API endpoints: notify, status, register, generate-amount\)
- SmsPaymentService \(decrypt, verify HMAC, process, auto-match\)
- VerifySmsCheckerDevice middleware \(API key + device auth\)
- SmsCheckerDevice model \(device management with key generation\)
- SmsPaymentNotification model \(SMS records with auto-match logic\)
- UniquePaymentAmount model \(decimal suffix 0.01-0.99 for payment matching\)
- Migration: 4 tables \(devices, notifications, unique_amounts, nonces\)
- Config: smschecker.php with env-based settings
- Routes: sms_payment_api.php

Security: AES-256-GCM encryption, HMAC-SHA256 signing, nonce replay prevention,
timestamp validation, device authentication.

Supports banks: KBANK, SCB, KTB, BBL, GSB, BAY, TTB, PromptPay

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(gh pr create --title "feat: SMS Payment Checker - Bank SMS Auto-Match Gateway" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö SMS Payment Gateway ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å Android app ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏∑‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ä‡∏≥‡∏£‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏á‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏ï‡πÇ‡∏ô‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥
- ‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö 8 ‡∏ò‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏Ñ‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÑ‡∏ó‡∏¢ \(KBANK, SCB, KTB, BBL, GSB, BAY, TTB, PromptPay\)
- ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö Unique Decimal Amount ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏¢‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏ó‡∏®‡∏ô‡∏¥‡∏¢‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞ \(0.01-0.99\) ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏à‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏π‡πà payment ‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏ï‡πÇ‡∏ô‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥
- ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏†‡∏±‡∏¢: AES-256-GCM encryption, HMAC-SHA256 signing, nonce replay prevention

## Files Added \(9 new, 2 modified\)

### New Files
| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/SmsPaymentController.php` | 5 API endpoints \(notify, status, register, generate-amount, notifications\) |
| `app/Http/Middleware/VerifySmsCheckerDevice.php` | Device API key authentication middleware |
| `app/Models/SmsCheckerDevice.php` | Device management with key generation |
| `app/Models/SmsPaymentNotification.php` | SMS notification records with auto-match logic |
| `app/Models/UniquePaymentAmount.php` | Unique decimal amount reservation system |
| `app/Services/SmsPaymentService.php` | Core service: decrypt, verify, process, match |
| `config/smschecker.php` | Configuration with env-based settings |
| `database/migrations/2024_01_01_000001_create_sms_payment_tables.php` | 4 tables: devices, notifications, unique_amounts, nonces |
| `routes/sms_payment_api.php` | Dedicated route file for SMS payment endpoints |

### Modified Files
| File | Change |
|------|--------|
| `routes/api.php` | Added `require` for sms_payment_api.php |
| `bootstrap/app.php` | Registered `smschecker` middleware alias |

## API Endpoints

### Device Auth \(X-Api-Key\)
- `POST /api/v1/sms-payment/notify` - Receive encrypted SMS notification
- `GET /api/v1/sms-payment/status` - Check device status
- `POST /api/v1/sms-payment/register-device` - Register device info

### User Auth \(Sanctum\)
- `POST /api/v1/sms-payment/generate-amount` - Generate unique payment amount for checkout
- `GET /api/v1/sms-payment/notifications` - View notification history

## How It Works
1. Customer places order ‚Üí System generates unique amount \(e.g., ‡∏ø500.37\)
2. Customer transfers exact amount via bank app
3. Bank sends SMS to phone running SMS Checker Android app
4. App parses SMS, encrypts data, sends to this API
5. API decrypts, validates, auto-matches with pending transaction
6. Payment confirmed automatically

## Setup After Merge
```bash
php artisan migrate
php artisan tinker
# Create device:
$d = App\\Models\\SmsCheckerDevice::create\([
    ''device_id'' => ''SMSCHK-001'',
    ''device_name'' => ''My Phone'',
    ''api_key'' => App\\Models\\SmsCheckerDevice::generateApiKey\(\),
    ''secret_key'' => App\\Models\\SmsCheckerDevice::generateSecretKey\(\),
    ''status'' => ''active'',
]\);
echo "API Key: " . $d->api_key . "nSecret: " . $d->secret_key;
```

## Test plan
- [ ] Run `php artisan migrate` - verify 4 tables created
- [ ] Create test device via tinker
- [ ] Test POST `/api/v1/sms-payment/notify` with valid API key
- [ ] Test unique amount generation via `/api/v1/sms-payment/generate-amount`
- [ ] Test auto-match: generate amount ‚Üí send matching notification ‚Üí verify status changes
- [ ] Test security: invalid API key, expired timestamp, duplicate nonce
- [ ] Test with Android SMS Checker app end-to-end

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)" --base claude/Main)

Bash(git -C "D:\\Code\\SmsChecker" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add expired order cleanup and improve OrderCard UI

- Add soft delete for EXPIRED/CANCELLED orders \(>1hr ‚Üí DELETED\)
- Add permanent delete for DELETED orders older than 7 days
- Fetch all order statuses from API to keep local DB in sync
- Redesign OrderCard with status icons, colors, and animations
- Add pulse animation for PENDING_REVIEW, bounce for AUTO_APPROVED
- Extract StatusVisuals for cleaner status-based styling

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\Code\\Thaiprompt-Affiliate" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: auto-approve order on SMS match and fix status mapping

- matchOrderByAmount\(\) now auto-approves via PaymentService::completePayment\(\)
  when a match is found, triggering downstream MLM/commission logic immediately
- approveOrder\(\) is now idempotent: returns 200 for already-completed transactions
  instead of 422, preventing perpetual offline queue on Android
- Fix status mapping: cancelled ‚Üí cancelled \(was incorrectly mapped to rejected\)
- Add expired and refunded status mappings for Android app

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\Code\\SmsChecker" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: prevent pendingAction loss and handle 422 in approveOrder

- fetchOrdersFromServer\(\): replace blind REPLACE with smart upsert
  that preserves local pendingAction \(offline queue\) when server data arrives
- approveOrder\(\): handle HTTP 422 as success when server says transaction
  is already approved \(auto-approved during match\), preventing perpetual
  offline retry queue

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(cmd.exe /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\\Program Files\\Android\\Android Studio\\jbr && D:\\Code\\SmsChecker\\gradlew.bat -p D:\\Code\\SmsChecker assembleRelease 2>&1")
